Method Detail

getCurrentVolume

public float getCurrentVolume()
Retrieves current volume level.

Returns:
volume value in range between 0 and 1.

setCurrentVolume

public void setCurrentVolume(float currentVolume)
Updates current volume. If playback is running, updates sound line

Parameters:
currentVolume - volume value in range 0 and 1.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case when requested volume is not in expected range

getSourceLocation

public java.lang.String getSourceLocation()
Returns current source location

Returns:
location

setSourceLocation

public void setSourceLocation(java.lang.String sourceLocation)
Sets current source location. It can contain URL or path to local file. If playback is running, stop() is pending. All buffering operations will be interrupted.

Parameters:
sourceLocation - URL or path to local file

public PlayerState getState()
Returns current player state

Returns:

getCurrentBufferedTimeMcsec

public long getCurrentBufferedTimeMcsec()
Returns size of buffered part of media. Size is represented by time in microseconds.

Returns:
how many microseconds was buffered

getCurrentPosition

public long getCurrentPosition()
Returns current play position

Returns:
how many microseconds was played

getTotalPlayTimeMcsec

public long getTotalPlayTimeMcsec()
Returns total size of playable media. Please note that this value is not updated before playback started.

Returns:
total media length in microseconds

public PlayerEventListener getListener()

isEndOfMediaReached

public boolean isEndOfMediaReached()
Checks, is last media was played and end of media was reached.

Returns:

play

public void play()
Attemts to start playback. If playback already running this method has no any effect. Playback startup is async operation: method initiates playback preparation and returns immediate - playback may run later.

playSync

public void playSync()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Initiate playback preparation and wait until playback will start.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

stop

public void stop()
Requests playback stop. Method initiate shutdown and return immediate. Playback stops later.

stopSync

public void stopSync()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Initiates playback stop and wait util it stops.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

pause

public void pause()
Requests pause. Returns immediate.

pauseSync

public void pauseSync()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Requests pause and wait until playback pauses.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

seek

public void seek(long newPos)
Requests seek. Returns immediate. Seek will happens later.

Parameters:
newPos -
